commandDescription: Validates alignment between XML and CSV representations of applications using string comparison or logic comparison
inputFlagDescription: Comma-separated list of application names to validate (without extension). If not specified, all applications will be validated
modeFlagDescription: Validation mode: 'string' for full string comparison, 'logic' for in-memory structure comparison (default: %s)
validationSummary: Validation Summary: %s applications validated, %s aligned, %s misaligned
examples: sf easysources applications arealigned -i Sales,Service -m string
